text: John Collins (born January 31, 1968 in Galashiels, Scotland) is a Scottish footballer. He is currently the manager of Charleroi. Collins played for Celtic in the early 1990s. == Other websites == *John Collins career stats at Soccerbase.com ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:People from Scottish Borders
title: John Collins
